articles.description: The new restrictions applies to dozens of cities and extends from Sumatra island in the west to easternmost Papua.. Read more at straitstimes.com.

articles.content:
KUALA LUMPUR/JAKARTA -- AirAsia is to acquire Indonesian unicorn Gojek's business in Thailand as the low-cost Malaysia airline steps up its digital ambitions.

articles.title: Fann Wong's father dies aged 81, Entertainment News - AsiaOne
articles.description: The father of local actress Fann Wong, Fann Chin Khew, has died. According to Lianhe Zaobao, he died on Monday (July 5) at age 81, and will be cremated on Sunday. When contacted, Fann's management agency told the Chinese daily that Fann and her family wish to…
articles.content:
The father of local actress Fann Wong, Fann Chin Khew, has died.
